internship1.title: Full-stack web internship
internship1.description: During my internship, I solved problems related to graphs and tables, optimized access rights, and made interface adjustments to improve functionality and aesthetics of the applications. I made significant visual and functional improvements using React.js, Node.js, TypeScript, SCSS, and GitLab.

internship2.title: Full-stack web internship
internship2.description: Development of a fishing marketplace, Blockchain Mare Nostrum, using React.js, symphony and SCSS. I tested APIs and identified issues, provided statistics to sellers and buyers, and optimized dashboards.

internship3.title: FULLSTACK WEB/AI CHATBOT INTERNSHIP
internship3.description: During my internship, I contributed to the development of an intelligent role-based stock management web application, integrating an OCR system, AI chatbot, and Power BI dashboard. Employees can rent products, while administrators manage users, suppliers, products, roles and purchases via a comprehensive interface. The backend architecture relies on five microservices: authentication and product management (Quarkus + JWT), chatbot (FastAPI), visualization (Python + Power BI) and notifications (Node.js). The interface also enables analysis.

internship4.title: FREELANCE
internship4.description: I worked on paid web and mobile projects for clients, including custom solutions for students and small businesses. I used the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) for web projects, as well as Java, XML, Android Studio and Firebase for a mobile project.

chatApp.title: Chat application
chatApp.description: Developed a real-time chat application where users can quickly create an account, generate a room with a unique code, and chat with multiple participants. Focused on user-friendly design, easy setup, and smooth messaging experience.

bookingApp.title: Student booking App
bookingApp.description: Developed a student booking app that shows real-time data (apartments) from '9annas.tn' by scraping them and showing them on my website while also showing their location on the map.

ecommerceClone.title: E-commerce website clone
ecommerceClone.description: Recreated the MODECO.tn website, but better! Focusing on delivering a responsive and user-friendly interface, ensuring optimal performance across devices while maintaining a clean and modern design.

weatherApp.title: Weather App
weatherApp.description: Developed a Weather App using React.js and CSS, featuring dynamic icon and icon color changes based on the weather temperature. Focused on providing a clean and responsive design with real-time weather updates.

absenceManager.title: Absence Manager
absenceManager.description: Created a student booking application with Android Studio (Java/XML) and Firebase. It uses Firestore and real-time database to manage teacher absences. The administrator can verify users, modify them, and view a detailed chart with all information.

marketplace.title: Marketplace
marketplace.description: Developed a complete marketplace website allowing users to buy, sell and manage their wishlists. Implemented registration, login, secure payment features and an intuitive interface that contains graphic charts to explain sales and purchases.

smartStockApp.title: SMART Stock Management Web App with OCR and Intelligent Chatbot
smartStockApp.description: Developed an intelligent role-based stock management web application, integrating an OCR system, AI chatbot, and Power BI dashboard. Employees can rent products, while administrators manage users, suppliers, products, roles and purchases via a comprehensive interface. The backend architecture relies on five microservices: authentication and product management (Quarkus + JWT), chatbot (FastAPI), visualization (Python + Power BI) and notifications (Node.js). The interface also enables automated invoice analysis via camera or image.

gymWebsite.title: GYM Website
gymWebsite.description: Gym website where you can sign in and get your gym membership online. The website is made from HTML/CSS/JavaScript/PHP/MySQL. It's a simple fullstack website for gyms where the user will have the ability to get advices for bodybuilding/fitness and have the capability to sign up and chose one of 2 kind of memberships.

movieRatingWebsite.title: Movie Rating Website - Tunibest
movieRatingWebsite.description: Tunibest is a movie rating website like IMDB made from HTML/CSS/JavaScript/PHP where users can rate their favourite movies. A simple and intuitive platform to discover and rate movies.

contact.text: I am always open to discuss new opportunities. Reach out if you'd like to collaborate on a project or simply say hi!

profile.name: Belhiba Tarak
profile.description: A passionate software developer specializing in web, mobile and AI development and interested in big data and cloud.

skillsSubtitle: Technologies and tools I work with
